Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP30
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP30.View.Gui

Class GodsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.PSP30.View.Gui.GodsController
  • public class GodsController
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the Gods.fxml scene (choice of the gods by the first player).

    • Method Detail

      • showGodSelector

        public void showGodSelector()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Shows the list of all the Gods usable during the game and allows the first player to choose the Gods he wants for the current match. The number of the cards selected has to be equal to the number of players chosen.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when an error loading FXML occurs.

      • showSingleGodSelector

        public void showSingleGodSelector​(java.util.ArrayList<God> gameGods,
                                  java.util.ArrayList<God> chosenGods)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Shows the list of the Gods chosen by the first player and allows the current player to choose what card he wants to use during the match.
        Parameters:
        gameGods - ArrayList of Gods chosen by the first player.
        chosenGods - ArrayList of Gods already chosen by others players.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when an error occurred in loading fxml file.

      • godAlreadyChosen

        public boolean godAlreadyChosen​(java.lang.String godName,
                                java.util.ArrayList<God> chosen)
        Checks if the selected God has already been chosen by other players.
        Parameters:
        godName - String that indicates the name of the selected God.
        chosen - ArrayList of Gods already chosen by others players.
        Returns:
        true if the selected God has already been chosen by other players, false otherwise.

      • singleGodChoiceToggleButtonImage

        public void singleGodChoiceToggleButtonImage​(java.lang.String godName,
                                             javafx.scene.control.ToggleButton button,
                                             javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane pane)
        Manages the choice of the God card.
        Parameters:
        godName - String that indicates the name of the selected God.
        button - button that contains the God card.
        pane - pane in which arrange the buttons.

      • flushPane

        public void flushPane​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event,
                      javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane pane)
        Does not show the image when the mouse is removed from the button (card).
        Parameters:
        event - mouse pointer is removed from the card.
        pane - pane in which arrange the buttons.

      • showCard

        protected void showCard​(javafx.scene.image.Image godSelectionCenter,
                        javafx.scene.image.Image godSelectionLeft)
        Handles the "On mouse entered" event on a god toggle button during god selection.
        Parameters:
        godSelectionCenter - the image will be shown in central position of the screen.
        godSelectionLeft - the image will be shown in left position of the screen.

      • selectApollo

        public void selectApollo​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
        Manages the selection of Apollo card by the mouse, it also verifies the number of cards selected is smaller than the number of players, otherwise no more cards can be selected.
        Parameters:
        event - mouse pointer have clicked on Apollo card.
